title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) with a single CLI/Docker command and a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for chatting, pulling, and managing local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter that adds Ollama models as a first-class LLM/embedding provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-user support, model import, and RAG plugins.

title: ollama-cli (ryanbekhen/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive TUI for browsing, pulling, and chatting with Ollama models written in Go.

title: ollama-copilot (cmiller01/ollama-copilot)
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot plugin that routes code-completion requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag (glangchain/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-chat (sugarforever/ollama-chat)
summary: Next.js chat interface that streams responses from Ollama with Tailwind styling and Docker packaging.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed chat, embed, and pull APIs plus DI extensions.

title: ollama-helm (jdetroyes/ollama-helm)
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings and CLI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-express (tmikaeld/ollama-express)
summary: Express.js middleware that proxies OpenAI-compatible endpoints to Ollama, enabling drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-qt (sbaildon/ollama-qt)
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop client for Ollama with model manager and chat interface.

title: ollama-obsidian (joethei/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-n8n-node (n8n-community/ollama-n8n-node)
summary: Community node for n8n workflow automation to chat, embed, or pull models from Ollama.

title: ollama-django (victorserpa/ollama-django)
summary: Reusable Django app providing Ollama chat and embedding APIs with admin UI and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-telegram (alirezathedev/ollama-telegram)
summary: Telegram bot that forwards group/private messages to a local Ollama instance and streams replies.
